articles.author: Misha Oberoi
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2024 semi-finals: Who is India playing against? Date, timings, venue | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Team India will face England in the semi-final on June 27 in Guyana. Team Afghanistan will face South Africa in the semi-final on the same day. If either match is washed out, the team which finished higher in their respective Super 8's group, will proceed to …
articles.content: Team India is yet to disappoint fans this T20 WorldCup. Fresh from its much awaited victory against Australia in the Super 8's match and Captain Rohit Sharma's ground-breaking 92 runs off 42 balls, t… [+1894 chars]
